short_summary: Renovation of the North District Headquarter of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for EZ899-231274B Phase II RCMP North District Headquarter Renovation

**Posting Information**

- **Title (English)**: EZ899-231274B Phase II RCMP North District Headquarter Renovation
- **Title (French)**: EZ899-231274B Phase II Rénovation du quartier général du District du Nord de la GRC
- **Reference Number**: WS3851933132-Doc3887758500
- **Amendment Number**: 5
- **Solicitation Number**: WS385193312
- **Posting Date**: February 24, 2023
- **Closing Date**: March 29, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Project Details**

- **Procurement Category**: CANST (Construction)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selecitve Tendering
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 28, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

**Project Description**

This notice invites qualified suppliers to bid on the EZ899-231274B Phase II RCMP North District Headquarter Renovation project. The solicitation follows an Invitation to Qualify, and only qualified suppliers have been invited to submit their bids.

**Bid Requirements and Evaluation Criteria**

- **Evaluation Criteria**: Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:

- **Name**: Wong, Summer (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note:
- I simplified the structure of the rewritten text to make it more user-friendly and visually appealing.
- I chose to keep the essential information and removed unnecessary details while ensuring that all relevant information is still present.
- I reformatted the text to improve readability and clarity. 
- I included an informative title, posting information, project details, and evaluated the original text to select only the most critical and relevant information that a potential supplier would need to know. 

Note that you can adjust this response as necessary to fit your needs. I will be happy to accommodate
